alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Shiawassee, Livingston and Genesee Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Millington to near Owosso to near Lansing. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Durand, Otisville, Bancroft and Otter Lake around 500 PM EDT. Byron and Gaines around 505 PM EDT. Cohoctah and Oak Grove around 510 PM EDT. Howell around 515 PM EDT. Hartland and Gregory around 520 PM EDT. Brighton around 525 PM EDT. South Lyon around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Atlas, Plainfield, Rankin, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Argentine, Conway Township, Pinckney State Recreation Area, Genesee, Vernon and Parkers Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
